title: German sticky buns (Schnecken)
description: These incredibly sweet more-ish buns have a sticky pecan topping and are filled with cinnamon and dried fruit. ‘Schnecken’ means snails in German, a reference the spiral shape of the buns.Equipment and preparation: you will need a free-standing mixer fitted with a dough hook.
ingredients: 1 large free-range egg, plus 1 yolk, beaten lightly
